result.reason: Adding regex support allows power users to perform complex searches, which is a standard feature in developer tools, and fits naturally into the existing filter architecture.
result.approach: Modify `ConnectionTreeSearchTextFilter.Filter` to detect a `regex:` prefix. If present, compile the subsequent string as a `Regex` (handling invalid patterns gracefully) and test it against connection properties (Name, Hostname, Description, Tags) instead of the default substring match.
